{
	dataset(
		id: "{{ .dataset_id }}"
	) {
		name
		description
		repo
		pii
		keywords
	}
}

RETURNS
{
  "data": {
    "dataset": {
      "name": "NewDataset",
      "description": "New description",
      "keywords": [
        "keyword1",
        "otherkeyword"
      ],
      "pii": "none",
      "repo": "somerepo"
    }
  }
}
